item.title: Recharge to Charge
item.description: Recharge to Charge Bible Verses Mark 6:1-13, 30-44 Preacher Fred Tow Preached on April 20, 2019 Sermon description Jesus gives us the privilege of serving him. However, if we do not pace ourselves, we can surely burn out. Therefore, it is imperative to set aside time to recharge and rest so that we can charge again. Ministry is a marathon and not a sprint.
